participant_1.background:
I prefer to keep my style simple and casual.
both my parents were teachers.
i am a wife.
i have a very tone body.
i never work more than 4 days in a row.

participant_2.background:
I've had to say goodbye to my cat, who was my best friend.
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
I enjoy a good debate with myself on my free time, perhaps over a glass of expensive wine.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
It's going great! I just finished creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.
Oh that sounds really cool! What was your favorite childhood book?
I think I would have to say "The Giving Tree" by Shel Silverstein. What was yours?
My favorite was "The Little Prince" by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry.
That's a great choice! I love that book.
It's so good. I read it every few years and always find something new to appreciate about it.
Me too! It's amazing how a book can still be relevant even after so many years.
I know, right? It's a timeless classic.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a wife and I work as a teacher.
Oh that's so nice! I'm a farmer.
That's cool! I've always wanted to live on a farm.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I bet it is. I love animals.
Me too! I have a bunch of chickens and a couple of goats.
That sounds so cute! I would love to see them sometime.
Sure! I'm always happy to have visitors.
Great! I'll have to come by soon.
Sounds good
